subject: Constructor that contains static method
msgSnippet: Hi I have a Constructor that sets up a global variable using a static method. When trying to test this constructor I get a NullPointerException pointing to the
messageBody:
Hi
I have a Constructor that sets up a global variable using a static
method. When trying to test this constructor I get a
NullPointerException pointing to the static method in the constructor.
Example of my code is below:

public Tax()throws DataSetException, SQLException{
this.countryId = getCountryId(Utils.getMyAdminGroup());
}

public void testTax() {
try{
tax = new Tax();
}catch(DataSetException dse){
fail("Threw DataSetException" + dse.getMessage());
}catch(SQLException se){
fail("Threw SQLException" + se.getMessage());
}
}

this is the error:
java.lang.NullPointerException

at framework.Utils.getMyAdminGroup(Utils.java:145)

at cost.Tax.<init>(Tax.java:19)

at cost.TestTax.setUp(TestTax.java:33)

at junit.framework.TestCase.runBare(TestCase.java:125)

at junit.framework.TestResult$1.protect(TestResult.java:106)

at junit.framework.TestResult.runProtected
(TestResult.java:124)

at junit.framework.TestResult.run(TestResult.java:109)

at junit.framework.TestCase.run(TestCase.java:118)

at junit.framework.TestSuite.runTest(TestSuite.java:208)

at junit.framework.TestSuite.run(TestSuite.java:203)

at com.borland.jbuilder.unittest.JBTestRunner.run
(JBTestRunner.java:206)

at com.borland.jbuilder.unittest.JBTestRunner.initiateTest
(JBTestRunner.java:248)

at com.borland.jbuilder.unittest.JBTestRunner.main
(JBTestRunner.java:554)

I have searched everywhere for similar problems but have had no luck.
Please can someone help.
